Method Detail

getGraphData

public java.util.HashMap<ChartSeriesDescription,java.util.List<GraphEntry>> getGraphData(Device device,
                                                                                         java.util.ArrayList<ChartSeriesDescription> seriesDescriptions,
                                                                                         java.util.Calendar startDate,
                                                                                         java.util.Calendar endDate)
Retrieves GraphEntry objects from FHEM. When the entries are available, the given listener object will be notified.

Parameters:
device - concerned device
seriesDescriptions - series descriptions each representing one series in the resulting chart
startDate - read FileLog entries from the given date
endDate - read FileLog entries up to the given date
Returns:
read graph data or null (if the device does not have a FileLog device)
